welcome.title: Bienvenue aux formulaires GC
welcome.product.title: La vision du produit
welcome.product.text: Aider les utilisateurs du gouvernement à publier rapidement et facilement des formulaires en ligne simples et accessibles que le public peut utiliser pour demander ou accéder aux services ou prestations dont il a besoin.
welcome.intakelink.title: Demo formulaire d'admission
welcome.design.title: Design
welcome.design.text: En savoir plus sur nos efforts en matière de conception, de recherche et d'accessibilité.
welcome.designsystem.title: Système de conception sur Storybook
welcome.technology.title: Technologie
welcome.technology.text: Notre pile technologique fonctionne sur Node.js et utilise les services de cloud computing AWS

ssc-tech.title: Technical Exception
ssc-tech.intro: Any urgent requests related to COVID-19 crisis management planning can be submitted as follows: Printers and Scanners: submit the order as a Time Sensitive Exception, email SSC.provisioningservice serviceapprovisionnement.SPC and include COVID-19 in the Subject header. Microcomputers: submit the order as a Time Sensitive Exception, email SSC.provisioningservice serviceapprovisionnement.SPC and include COVID-19 in the Subject header. Software: email SSC.provisioningservice-serviceapprovisionnement.SPC@canada.ca and include COVID-19 in the subject header.
ssc-tech.questions.description: Submit the order as a Time Sensitive Exception, email SSC.provisioningservice-serviceapprovisionnement.SPC@canada.ca and include COVID-19 in the subject header.
ssc-tech.order.title: Order Summary
ssc-tech-2.title: Part A: Enter your contract information
ssc-tech-2.subtitle-1: Indicate the type of access required
ssc-tech-2.subtitle-2: Indicate the type of information that the supplier will be required to access
ssc-tech-2.radio-1: Will the supplier require access to Controlled Goods?
ssc-tech-2.radio-2: Will the supplier require access to unclassified military technical data subject to the provisions of the Technical Data Control Regulations?
ssc-tech-2.radio-3: Will the supplier and its employees require access to PROTECTED and/or CLASSIFIED information or assets?
ssc-tech-2.radio-4: Will the supplier and its employees (e.g. cleaners, maintenance personnel) require access to restricted access areas? No access to PROTECTED and/or CLASSIFIED information or assets is permitted.
ssc-tech-2.radio-5: Is this a commercial courier or delivery requirement with no overnight storage?
ssc-tech-3.title: Part B: Enter personnel information
ssc-tech-4.title: Part C: Enter your safeguard (supplier) information
ssc-tech-5.title: Part D: Enter your authorization information
